feature_model.name: graph_manipulation
feature_model.feature_tree: :r graph_manipulation (graph_manipulation) :m graph (graph) :m move (move) :m entity_add (entity_add) :m add (add) :m services (services) :m delete (delete) :m connector_add (connector_add) :m moving_mode (moving_mode) :m selection_mode (selection_mode) :m select (select) :o move_do_undo_redo (move_do_undo_redo) :m select_do_undo_redo (select_do_undo_redo) :m delete_do_undo_redo (delete_do_undo_redo) :m do_undo_redo (do_undo_redo) :m add_do_undo_redo (add_do_undo_redo) :o layer_adjust_do_undo_redo (layer_adjust_do_undo_redo) :o compose_do_undo_redo (compose_do_undo_redo) :o zoom_inout (zoom_inout) :o moving_constraint (moving_constraint) :g [1, 1] : vertical_constraint (vertical_constraint) : horizontal_constraint (horizontal_constraint) :o down_layer (down_layer) :m layer_adjust (layer_adjust) :m up_layer (up_layer) :o compose (compose) :g [1, 1] : outline_moving (outline_moving) : content_moving (content_moving) :g [1, 1] : increment_selection (increment_selection) : non_increment_selection (non_increment_selection)
feature_model.constraints: constraint_1:~compose_do_undo_redo or compose constraint_2:~layer_adjust_do_undo_redo or down_layer
